message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.

Dear Alice, thank you for the offer. While I recognize the value of your product, I believe the current price point is a bit high for my budget. I would be willing to consider purchasing it for $700,000.

Dear Bob, I appreciate your interest in our product. After considering your offer, I am proposing a counteroffer of $850,000. This price reflects the value we place on the product and our desire to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I hope this aligns better with your budget considerations. Let me know your thoughts.
Dear Alice, thank you for your counteroffer.  I'm eager to find a solution that works for both of us.  Would you consider $750,000?

Dear Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product. After reviewing your latest offer, I am pleased to propose a counteroffer of $825,000. This price aims to balance our needs while providing a fair deal for you. I hope this proposal will be more in line with your expectations.
Alice, we're getting closer.  To meet you halfway, I can offer $780,000. Let's get this done!

Dear Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am proposing a counteroffer of $810,000. This price aims to provide a satisfactory compromise between our respective positions. I hope this offer will be more acceptable to you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to work with me.  How about we settle this right now at $795,000?  It's a fair deal for both of us.

Dear Bob, I understand your position and am willing to consider a final offer. I am proposing a counteroffer of $805,000. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to conclude this negotiation satisfactorily. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
